video_prompt: **Prompt:** Anime female archer draws glowing ice-bow, blue energy pulsing from arrow tip. Lightning flickers in the dark background, illuminating shimmering reflections on her ornate attire as she aims. Magical power intensifies.
image_prompt: Anime female archer with glowing red eyes and short pink hair, drawing a translucent ice bow and arrow glowing bright blue. She wears an ornate white and red outfit with dark thigh-high stockings. Dark background with subtle glowing fragments and lightning. Emphasize magical energy and a powerful, determined pose.
refined_video_prompt: An archer's arm pulls back, drawing her bow as its glow pulses brighter. Blue energy vigorously pulses from the arrow tip. Lightning flashes across the dark background, causing dynamic reflections to shimmer on her attire. Her focused expression visibly intensifies as magical power surges around her.
